statements: SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM fraud_detection
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' AND is_fraud = FALSE;
SELECT detection_id, fraud_score FROM fraud_detections;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detections ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT reported_by_user_id, fraud_details FROM reported_frauds;
SELECT report_id, report_timestamp FROM reported_frauds WHERE reported_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(fraud_score) AS average_fraud_score FROM fraud_detections;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detections WHERE fraud_score > 0.5 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT detection_id, fraud_score FROM fraud_detections WHERE detected_by_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY fraud_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM reported_frauds WHERE JSONB_EXISTS(fraud_details, 'location') ORDER BY report_timestamp ASC;
SELECT report_id, fraud_details -> 'reason' AS fraud_reason FROM reported_frauds WHERE reported_by_user_id = '456e7890-e12b-45c6-d789-0123e4567890' ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC;

SELECT detection_id, detection_timestamp, fraud_score FROM fraud_detections JOIN reported_frauds ON fraud_detections.detected_by_user_id = reported_frauds.reported_by_user_id ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC, report_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_cases;
SELECT case_description, case_status FROM fraud_cases WHERE case_status = 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM fraud_alerts ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_cases WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT case_description FROM fraud_cases WHERE case_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT case_id, case_description FROM fraud_cases ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_id, case_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM fraud_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority' ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_alerts;
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM fraud_detection_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_id, user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, fraud_flag FROM transaction_logs WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_alerts
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM fraud_detection_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, fraud_flag FROM transaction_logs WHERE fraud_flag = true
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT message, status FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT rule_name, action FROM rules WHERE rule_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT alert_id, message, status, date FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 5 AND status = 'new';
SELECT rule_name, action FROM rules WHERE query LIKE '%DELETE%';
SELECT t.amount, a.message FROM transactions t JOIN alerts a ON t.transaction_id = a.alert_id WHERE t.amount > 500;
